books:
鄧姚文　譯, PCMCIA系統架構：16位元PC卡　第二版, 碁峰資訊股份有限公司, 1999年1月, ISBN 957-566-387-X.
原著：D. Anderson, PCMCIA Architecture: 16-bit PC Cards, Addison-Wesley, 2nd Ed., 1995.

鄧姚文　譯, MCSE訓練手冊：Networking Essentials, 碁峰資訊股份有限公司, 1999年3月, ISBN 957-566-434-5.
原著：J. Casad and D. Newland, MCSE Training Guide: Networking Essentials, New Riders Publishing, 1997.

楊玄彰、鄧姚文　編譯, Visual C++ 6超級手冊, 碁峰資訊股份有限公司, 1999年5月, ISBN 957-566-497-3.
原著：Kate Gregory, Special Edition Using Visual C++ 6, QUE CONSUMER an imprint of Macmillan Computer Publishing U.S.A, 1998.

翔威國際股份有限公司, OpenLinux eDesktop入門, 商智文化, 2001年1月, ISBN 957-667-819-6.
第一章：簡介、第四章：操作。.

翔威國際股份有限公司, OpenLinux eDesktop應用, 商智文化, 2001年3月, ISBN 957-667-858-7.
第四章：程式開發環境.

鄭王駿、鄧姚文　編著, 電腦及網際網路（第二版）, 全華科技圖書股份有限公司, 2001年8月, ISBN 957-21-3309-8.
原著：Douglas E. Comer, Computer Networks and Internets, 2nd Ed., Prentice Hall, 1999. ISBN 0130836176.

鄭王駿、鄧姚文　編著, 電腦及網際網路（第三版）, 全華科技圖書股份有限公司, 2002年12月, ISBN 957-21-3764-6.
原著：Douglas E. Comer, Computer Networks and Internets, 3rd Ed., Prentice Hall, 2001. ISBN 0130935816.

鄭王駿、鄧姚文　編著, 電腦及網際網路（第四版）, 全華科技圖書股份有限公司, 2005年8月, ISBN 957-21-4978-4.
原著：Douglas E. Comer, Computer Networks and Internets with Internet Applications, 4th Ed., Prentice Hall, 2004. ISBN 0-13-143351-2.

鄧姚文、林德芬、陳泰良　編譯, 作業系統入門（第三版）, 高立圖書股份有限公司, 2006年5月, ISBN 986-7138-30-9.
原著：Ida M. Flynn and Ann M. McHoes, Understanding Operating Systems, 3rd Ed., Brooks/Cole (Thomson), 2001. ISBN 0-534-37666-5.

鄧姚文　編譯, 作業系統概論, 高立圖書股份有限公司, 2010年9月, ISBN 9789866637971.
原著：Ann M. McHoes and Ida M. Flynn, Understanding Operating Systems, 6th Ed., CENGAGE, 2011, ISBN 9780538470049.
journalPapers: W. T. Chen（陳文村）, Y. W. Deng（鄧姚文）, N. F. Huang（黃能富）, J. S. Wang（王家祥）, and H. C. Lin（林華君）, "On the design of a high-speed network environment for multimedia applications," Proceedings of the National Science Council, Republic of China, Part A: Physical Science and Engineering, Vol.23, No. 1, January 1999, pp. 111–124.
W. T. Chen and Y. W. Deng, "PPCN: A high-performance copy network architecture for large scale ATM switching systems," IEICE Transactions on Communications, Vol. E82-B, No. 1, January 1999, pp. 1–13.
Y. W. Deng and W. T. Chen, "An efficient parallel multicast ATM switch," IEE Proceedings - Communications, Vol. 147, No. 2, April, 2000, pp. 123–132.
conferencePapers: W. T. Chen, Y. W. Deng, W. J. Cheng（鄭王駿）, and W. T. Lin（林文宗）, "The design and implementation of a communication platform for multimedia multiparty applications," in Proc. RAMS'95–the First Workshop on Real-time and Multimedia Systems, Academia Sinica, Taipei, Taiwan, July 1995, pp. 135–144.

W. T. Chen, N. F. Huang, J. S. Wang, H. C. Lin, and Y. W. Deng, "A high-speed network environment for multimedia applications," (invited paper) in Proc. of the International Conference on Computer Systems for Industrial Applications, Hsinchu, Taiwan, April 1996, pp. 270–277.

W. Y. Hwang（黃武元）, W. T. Chen, and Y. W. Deng, "A high-performance ATM switch with completely and fairly shared buffers," in Proc. ICPADS'97–International Conference on Parallel And Distributed Systems, Seoul, Korea, December 1997, pp. 203–208.

W. T. Chen, Y. W. Deng and L. H. Liao（廖立祥）, "TPCN: A nonblocking self-routing copy network for high-speed switching systems," in Proc. APCC'97–3rd Asia Pacific Conference on Communications, Sydney, Australia, December 1997, pp. 1428–1432.

W. T. Chen and <u>Y. W. Deng</u>, "A two-stage nonblocking copy network for ATM switching systems," in Proc. TJCOM'98–Taiwan-Japan Joint Workshop on the Latest Development of Telecommunication Research, Hsin-Chu, Taiwan, January 1998, pp. 83–88.

W. T. Chen, Y. W. Deng, C. P. Wang（王全璞）, N. F. Huang, H. C. Lin, C. C. Lu（呂忠津） and R. C. Chang（張瑞雄）, "On the design of a high-performance ATM bridge," in Proc. ICATM'98–IEEE International Conference on ATM, Colmar, France, June 1998, pp. 207–213.

W. T. Chen, G. Y. Chiou（邱繼陽）, W. T. Lin, and <u>Y. W. Deng</u>, "A QoS Guaranteed MAC Protocol for Wireless ATM Networks," in Proc. ICOIN-13–The 13th International Conference on Information Networking, Cheju Island, Korea, January 1999, pp. 7A-4.1–7A-4.6.
<u>鄧姚文</u>、鄭王駿（2007），IP 溯源之研究， 第三屆資訊管理學術暨專案管理實務國際研討會， 桃園：開南大學。
鄭王駿、<u>鄧姚文</u>（2007），以無偽造 IP 來源位址的預防機制封鎖網路攻擊，第九屆網際空間：資安、犯罪與法律社會學術研究暨實務研討會論文集，pp. 297-304。
鄭王駿, <u>鄧姚文</u>, 李孟晃, 蔡政璋（2011）, 一個基於灰名單的垃圾郵件過濾機制, 2011 電子商務與數位生活研討會論文集, pp. 1367-1389。
鄭王駿, <u>鄧姚文</u>, 李瑞元, 許皓政, 賴俊維, 陳琬茹, 陳秋綾, 陳宗賢（2011）, 使用動態網路管理機制實現一個具有網路防弊特性的線上測驗環境, 2011 電子商務與數位生活研討會論文集, pp. 1390-1398。
鄭王駿, 王可為, 黃耀賢, <u>鄧姚文</u>（2011）, 設計與實作具精簡且有效率的嵌入式系統多點觸控手勢辨識器, 2011 全國計算機會議, pp. 82-93。
鄭王駿, <u>鄧姚文</u>, 張雋文, 高偉翔, 張書瑋, 廖元銘 （2012）, 基於雲端計算之反垃圾郵件服務設計, 第18屆 海峽兩岸資訊管理發展與策略學術研討會, 2012 年 8 月, pp. 30。
